org.jplot2d.element

Interface PlotAxis

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Axis, Element, PComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlotAxisEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlotAxisImpl

    public interface PlotAxis
extends Axis
    A component to represent an axis in a plot. Besides the normal axis, it can draw grid lines.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AxisOrientation getOrientation()
      Orientation is a read-only property.
      Plot getParent()
      Gets the parent of this component.
      AxisPosition getPosition()
      Return the position of the axis: NEGATIVE_SIDE, POSITIVE_SIDE.
      boolean isGridLines()
      Return if the grid line is displayed or not.
      boolean isMinorGridLines()
      Return if the minor grid line is displayed or not.
      void setGridLines(boolean showGridLines)
      Show/hide grey lines in corresponding of major ticks of the axis.
      void setMinorGridLines(boolean showGridLines)
      Show/hide grey lines in corresponding of minor ticks of the axis.
      void setPosition(AxisPosition position)
      Set the position of the axis: NEGATIVE_SIDE, POSITIVE_SIDE.

      • getOrientation

        @Nullable
AxisOrientation getOrientation()
        Orientation is a read-only property. It just show the orientation of this axis after it has been add as a X/Y axis.
        Returns:
        orientation of this axis

      • getPosition

        @Nonnull
AxisPosition getPosition()
        Return the position of the axis: NEGATIVE_SIDE, POSITIVE_SIDE.
        Returns:
        the position of the axis in the plot.

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(@Nonnull
               AxisPosition position)
        Set the position of the axis: NEGATIVE_SIDE, POSITIVE_SIDE. The default value is AxisPosition.NEGATIVE_SIDE.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the axis in a plot.

      • isGridLines

        boolean isGridLines()
        Return if the grid line is displayed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the grid line is displayed

      • setGridLines

        void setGridLines(boolean showGridLines)
        Show/hide grey lines in corresponding of major ticks of the axis.
        Parameters:
        showGridLines - if true show the grid lines.

      • isMinorGridLines

        boolean isMinorGridLines()
        Return if the minor grid line is displayed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the minor grid line is displayed

      • setMinorGridLines

        void setMinorGridLines(boolean showGridLines)
        Show/hide grey lines in corresponding of minor ticks of the axis.
        Parameters:
        showGridLines - if true show the grid lines.
